sentences.en: -- Gradually setting up an animal husbandry production structure conforming to the characteristics of China's resources.
sentences.cn: -- 逐步建立符合中国资源特点的畜牧业生产结构.

sentences.en: Animal husbandry is the pillar industry of rural economics.
sentences.cn: 牧业是农村经济的支柱产业.

sentences.en: Animal husbandry on the grassland is developing rapidly.
sentences.cn: 草原上的畜牧业在迅速发展.

sentences.en: Beginning nearly 10,000 years ago, man adopted animal husbandry practices.
sentences.cn: 约在一万年以前, 人类就开始从事畜牧业的工作.

sentences.en: Intensivism agricultural projects such as farming and livestock husbandry.
sentences.cn: 投资农、业、畜牧业等集约型农业项目.

sentences.en: Low and unstable grain production, husbandry, mainly in the main livestock raised.
sentences.cn: 粮食产量低而不稳, 畜牧业主要以养大家畜为主.

sentences.en: Most of it has been retained in alternate husbandry.
sentences.cn: 其中大部分成为轮作草地.

sentences.en: Shed - breeding technology project relies on Beijing Chief Animal Husbandry and Veterinarian Station.
sentences.cn: 依托北京市畜牧兽医总站实施舍饲饲养技术工程.

sentences.en: The animal husbandry of Guangdong relies mainly on raising pig and poultry.
sentences.cn: 广东畜牧业以饲养生猪和家禽为主.

sentences.en: The animal husbandry output value accounts for oftotal agriculture output value.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业产值占农业总产值的比重达70%以上,居全国前列.

sentences.en: The basin favours the development of farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.cn: 这个盆地有利于农业和畜牧业的发展.

sentences.en: The vast area of jurisdiction, Lin animal husbandry, aquaculture facilities provided.
sentences.cn: 辽阔的辖区面积, 为林牧业 、 水产养殖提供了便利条件.

sentences.en: They depended on animal husbandry for their livelihood.
Through careful husbandry we survived the hard winter.
sentences.cn: 通过精打细算,我们终于熬过了严冬.

sentences.en: To let the roof leak would be bad husbandry.
sentences.cn: 屋漏不修,不是个好管家(的办法).

trans.tran_cn: 农业，资源管理，妥善管理
